measured_by: Process Dissociation procedure (16 moral dilemma scenarios)
justification: "To measure utilitarianism/deontology, we used the Process Dissociation procedure with 16 out of 20 original scenarios from Conway & Gawronski (2013)."

measured_by: Process Dissociation procedure (16 moral dilemma scenarios)
justification: "To measure utilitarianism/deontology, we used the Process Dissociation procedure with 16 out of 20 original scenarios from Conway & Gawronski (2013)."
"We also measured two other variables unrelated to this research: risk-taking (using self-created set of lotteries)…"
"…and disgust sensitivity (using self-created Sounds of Disgust Scale, and Three Domain Disgust Scale, Tybur et al., 2009)."
